This very site...

...was made with 11ty and Netlify CMS, and hosted with Netlify. This site isn't flashy, but it is fully CRUD (thanks to its Netlify CMS back-end), it is lightweight (under 5kB), it is accessible, and it is fast (perfect scores on Lighthouse!).
